subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Michigan and its football coach, Rich Rodriguez, have agreed to pay a $4 million buyout and settle a lawsuit that West Virginia filed after Rodriguez broke his contract and left in December. Rodriguez will pay $1.5 million in three annual payments beginning January 2010. The Wolverines’ athletic department will pay $2.5 million by the end of July.
